Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G C2 G C2]
Verse 1: All who are [G]thirsty All who are [Bm7]weak Come to the [C2]fountain Dip your heart in the [Am7]stream [G/B]of [C2]life Let the [D]pain and the [G]sorrow Be washed [Bm7]away In the waves of His [C2]mercy As deep cries [Am7]out [G/B]to [C2]deep [D]We sing
Chorus 1:
[G]Come Lord Jesus [C2]come [G]Come Lord Jesus [C2]come
Verse 1: All who are [G]thirsty All who are [Bm7]weak Come to the [C2]fountain Dip your heart in the [Am7]stream [G/B]of [C2]life Let the [D]pain and the [G]sorrow Be washed [Bm7]away In the waves of His [C2]mercy As deep cries [Am7]out [G/B]to [C2]deep [D]We sing
Chorus 1:
[G]Come Lord Jesus [C2]come [G]Come Lord Jesus [C2]come
BRIDGE:
As deep cries [Am7]out [G/B]to [C2]deep As deep cries [Am7]out [G/B]to [C2]deep As deep cries [Am7]out [G/B]to [C2]deep [D]We sing
Chorus 1:
[G]Come Lord Jesus [C2]come [G]Come Lord Jesus [C2]come
Chorus 2:
[G]Holy Spirit [C2]come [G]Holy Spirit [C2]come
